law.catch_line: The purposes of this subtitle are:...

text.section:
The purposes of this subtitle are:
to provide for, strengthen, and expedite national defense when emergency conditions threaten the peace and security of the United States and the State; and
to enable the State to fulfill more successfully the requirements of national defense.

To achieve these purposes, this subtitle temporarily suspends:
enforcement of civil liabilities against persons in emergency management service to enable them to devote their entire energy to the emergency management needs of the State and the United States;
enforcement of civil liabilities against persons suffering injury or damage to enable them to devote their entire energy to the cure or improvement of the injuries or damage suffered; and
legal proceedings and transactions that may prejudice the civil rights of persons in emergency management service or persons suffering injury or damage during the emergency period to which this subtitle is applicable.
